mapper.select: /* 멤버십 레벨 기본값 */ SELECT l.mlevel, m.mvlevel, m.mvpntr FROM member_level l LEFT JOIN member_level_master m ON l.mlevel = m.mvcode AND m.mvuse = 'Y' WHERE l.yyyymm = CONVERT(CHAR(4),DATEPART(YY,GETDATE())) + RIGHT('0'+CONVERT(VARCHAR(2),DATEPART(M,GETDATE())),2) AND l.memcd = #{strLoginMemCd}

/* 당월 만료예정 쿠폰 수 */ SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM coupon_wallet w JOIN coupon_master m ON w.cwcidx = m.cmcidx AND m.cmusyn = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND w.cwstcd IN ('10') AND DATEDIFF(day, getdate(),w.cwepedt) >= 0 AND DATEPART(mm, getdate()) = DATEPART(mm,w.cwepedt) AND cwmemcd = #{strLoginMEMCD}
